person.persName: C. Thompson Worley (Lexington, Kentucky, auctioneer and mayor)

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, auctioneer and mayor. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Worley. Father of Frank H. Worley and Joshua Worley. Married to Elizabeth Worley. Farmer in Jessamine County, Kentucky, in 1850. Auctioneer in Lexington in 1860. Owned four enslaved person in 1860. Mayor of Lexington in 1862.
